kerb market.translation[0].definitions[0: an unofficial market in shares etc that operates when the official market is closed, with buying and selling done over the telephone
kerb market.translation[0].definitions[1: an unofficial market for shares in some countries. A kerb market takes place in the street outside the stockmarket
